game.name: Fish and Chill
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A cozy idle fishing game where your fisherman catches fish automatically while you relax. Sell your catch, upgrade your boat, and enjoy the calming sea in a transparent, borderless overlay that floats on any desktop.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cozy idle fishing game where your fisherman catches fish automatically while you relax. Sell your catch, upgrade your boat, and enjoy the calming sea in a transparent, borderless overlay that floats on any desktop.
